channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 Big Takeaways From This Earnings Season
item.description: Quarterly earnings are on pace to leap ahead for companies in the S&P 500, while revenue underperforms—a scenario that suggests cost-cutting, and not performance, are the driver of recent profits.

item.title: Deutsche Bank says Eli Lilly stock is a buy — in line with our rating on shares
item.description: The Investing Club holds its "Morning Meeting" every weekday at 10:20 a.m. ET.

item.title: AI Is About to Boost Power Bills---Who'll Take Heat for That?
item.description: High prices are a windfall for power plant owners but are starting to raise difficult questions.

item.title: Restaurant CEOs’ new favorite word is value as they aim to bring back customers
item.description: Restaurant CEOs can't stop using the word "value" in explaining lackluster quarterly sales to investors while detailing plans to appeal to thrifty customers.

item.title: Investors Borrowed Like Crazy During the Rally. Now They're Paying the Price.
item.description: Behind the market tumult of the past month: the rapid unwind of several popular trades and the heavy use of leverage

item.title: E.l.f. Beauty sales jump 50% on gains in color cosmetics and skin care, launch of Bronzing Drops serum
item.description: E.l.f. Beauty has won over younger consumers with its viral marketing and low-priced "dupes" of prestige favorites.

item.title: How Bank of America Ignores Its Own Rules to Prevent Dangerous Workloads
item.description: The death of a former Green Beret sparks an outcry about the all-nighters and 100-hour weeks that grind down young investment bankers.

item.title: Paramount Global announces it will cut 15% of U.S. workforce, shares rise on second-quarter earnings
item.description: Paramount Global plans to cut 15% of its U.S. workforce as part of a broader $500 million cost reduction.

item.title: I'm 37 Years Old, and I Haven't Saved Nearly Enough for Retirement. What Do I Do?
item.description: Like so many millennials, I started saving late, and catching up hasn’t been easy.

item.title: Under Armour shares surge 20% after posting 'better than feared' quarterly sales
item.description: Under Armour is in the midst of a broad restructuring as the company contends with a sales slowdown and a revolving door of leaders.
